legal-canons.title: Ƙa'idodin Dokoki
legal-canons.description: Zaɓin samfur na tarin ka'idojin doka

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Matsayin da zai yi amfani da URL don tarin ku.

visibility.title: Bayyanawa
visibility.description: Tarin jama'a suna bayyanawa ga kowa. Tarin da ba a ambaci su ba za a iya samun su ta hanyar haɗin kai tsaye kawai.

danger-zone.title: Yankin Hadari
danger-zone.description: Da zarar ka goge tarin, ba za ka iya yin baya ba. Da fatan za a tabbata.
